privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: This privacy policy describes how Elepad collects, uses and protects your personal information.

dataCollection.title: What data we collect
dataCollection.personalInfoDetails:
• First and last name
• Email address
• Profile picture (optional)
• Date of birth
• Authentication information (when using Google OAuth)
dataCollection.usageDataDetails:
• Progress and scores in cognitive games (Memory, Sudoku, NET, Focus)
• Achievements and activity streaks
• History of completed games
• Application usage frequency
dataCollection.userContentDetails:
• Shared memories and stories
• Family photos and albums
• Calendar events and activities
• Personal notes and descriptions
dataCollection.familyDataDetails:
• Information about family group members (with their consent)
• Family relationships
• Content shared within the group

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.locationDetails: Your data is securely stored on Supabase servers, which uses AWS infrastructure with SOC 2 certification.
dataStorage.encryptionDetails: All information is transmitted via HTTPS/TLS and stored with encryption at rest.
dataStorage.retentionDetails: We maintain your data while your account is active. If you don't use the application for 2 consecutive years, we will contact you to confirm if you wish to keep your account.
dataStorage.backupDetails: We perform automatic backups that are kept for 30 days for disaster recovery.

permissions.title: Application Permissions
permissions.cameraDetails: To take profile photos and add images to your memories. We only access photos that you select.
permissions.calendarDetails: To sync family events with Google Calendar. You can link or unlink at any time.
permissions.notificationsDetails: For reminders of events, achievements and streak celebrations. You can disable them at any time.

privacy.changesDetails: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through an in-app notice or email. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically.
